headline: Delta Is Fined $50,000 for Barring Three Muslim Passengers
abstract: The Transportation Department also ordered the airline to make flight crews and customer service representatives attend civil rights training.
lead_paragraph: Delta has been fined $50,000 after the federal Transportation Department found that it discriminated against three Muslim passengers who had been cleared by the airlineâ€™s security but were barred from flights, according to a consent order.
